minesweeper

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    cell class which is the smallest unit of our board it contains all the attributes of the cell that it can contain. 1. A cell can be clicked 2. A cell has a mine 3. A cell can be flagged 4. A cell contains a number based on neighboring mines
    Author:
    SUMALATHA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell()
      this constructor sets everything to false by default and sets number neighbors to -1
